title: Planning a tree planting program
creator_credit: Gerry North and Western Australia. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: Advises farmers on the necessary steps to take in planning a tree planting program, including identifying problem areas that trees can help rectify, choosing appropriate varieties and budgeting.
